n = int(input())
s = list(input())

for i in range(n):
    if s[i] == "R":
        print(n - i)
    elif s[i] == "L":
        print(i + 1)
        exit()
        exit()
import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    d, t, s = line.split()
    d = int(d)
    t = int(t)
    s = int(s)
    if d / s <= t:
        print("Yes")
    else:
        print("No")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    d, t, s = line.split()
    d = int(d)
    t = int(t)
    s = int(s)
    if (d / s) <= t:
        print("Yes")
    else:
        print("No")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


d, t, s = map(float, input().split())

if d / s <= t:
    print("Yes")
    
else:
    print("No")


n = int(input()) + 1
s = list(input())[:n]

for i in range(n - 1):
    if s[i] == "R":
        print(n - i - 1)
        exit()
import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    d, t, s = line.split()
    d = int(d)
    t = int(t)
    s = int(s)
    if (d / s) <= (t + 0.5):
        print("Yes")
    else:
        print("No")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    d, t, s = line.split()
    d = int(d)
    t = int(t)
    s = int(s)
    if (d / s) <= t
        print("Yes")
    else
        print("No")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

if d / s <= t:
    print("Yes")
    
else:
    print("No")
